name: 3D Monster Truck City Rampage - Extreme Car Crushing Destruction & Racing Simulator PRO
name_original: 3D Monster Truck City Rampage - Extreme Car Crushing Destruction & Racing Simulator PRO
description:
Ever wanted to drive a real monster truck down city streets? Well now’s your chance. Pick your favorite truck and tear down the road in a race to see how far you can get before time runs out. Avoid hitting buildings. What about traffic you say? Destroy it all, Smash every car in your path! So much destruction, you’ll have a blast in this endless racing game.

Features
-Realistic 3D graphics
-Dynamic Traffic
-Destroy cars and other obstacles
-3 Monster Trucks to choose from
